---
title: "Inspect metadata"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
metadata <-
  list.files(
    "../../preprocessed_data",
    pattern = "replicate_level_cp_normalized_variable_selected.csv.gz",
    recursive = TRUE,
    full.names = TRUE
  ) %>%
  set_names(nm =
              (basename(dirname(dirname(
                .
              ))) %>%
                tools::file_path_sans_ext())) %>%
  map_df(function(filename) {
    message(filename)
    read_csv(
      filename,
      col_select = !matches("Cells_|Cytoplasm_|Nuclei_"),
      col_types = cols(.default = col_character())
    )
  }, .id = "Metadata_dataset") 
```


```{r}
metadata %>% arrow::write_parquet("output/cp_metadata.parquet")
```

```{r}
metadata_summary <- 
  metadata %>%
  group_by(Metadata_dataset) %>%
  skimr::skim()
```
